messages.message: Congrats on your success at Swiftpage, Brian. I'm CEO for one of the fastest growing English learning apps globally, FluentWorlds. It has over 54 3D levels, advanced accent reduction, a 4.9 iTunes rating & web version. Expanding dev team, needs: Java,Linux,PhP,Python,Unity,WordPress. Thanks!

Thank you for reaching out David.  I've spent years working on an education app called 
StudySauce.com
 . It's like flashcard but it uses the forgetting curve to remind you of what material you're about to forget.  I certainly appreciate the pursuit of bettering education.
How many downloads have you had for your app? How do you charge for?
We did a few pilots with less than 1000 users total. We would charge a small monthly subscription or a one time fee depending on the client. Anyone can contribute new material.
